The Third Secret

Ano: 1964

IMDb ID: tt0058649

Classificação: 6.5

Sinopse: A prominent London psychologist seems to have taken his own life, causing stunned disbelief amongst his colleagues and patients. His teenage daughter refuses to believe it was suicide, as this would go against all of the principles for which her father stood, therefore she is convinced it was murder. She enlists the help of a former patient to try to get to the truth. The truth, however, turns out to be surprising and disturbing.—Kevin Steinhauer
